title: Ar arivAr
sahitya:
Ar arivAr anda AnandamE ennai aLLik-kalandanan anbu maNALan


anupallavi

  Ur peyar shuTram jAti matha mayakkam onrumillai oru yOgak-kanavilE
mArburat-tazhuviyen manadaik-koLLai koNDAn mANikkavAcakak-kANikkai koNDavan


caraNam    Oviuam tITTumO kAviyam kATTumO uLLazhagan karuNai vaLLal ennANDavan
Aviyirk-kalandanan dEvAdi dEvanE avananri nAnillai avaniyumillaiyE
